onset.Description: Onset in seconds measured with optical sensor attached to projector

duration.Description: Duration of the event (measured from onset) in seconds

trial_type.Description: Primary categorisation of each trial to identify them as instances of the experimental conditions (exp), catch condition (catch), or repeat condition (test)

things_category_nr.Description: Secondary categorisation of each trial to identify them as instances of the THINGS categories

value.Description: Tertiary categorisation of each trial to identify them in the context of THINGS image numbers

sample.Description: Onset (in samples, 1200 Hz) of the event measured with optical sensor attached to projector
